channel.title: Comments on: Get to re-organize home network

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Done with new ISP, new firmware for Linksys E1000 (DD-WRT), and new network arrangement (repeater mode), however the quality didn't change too much ... I need to locate a better place for the repeater, should close to garage as the bridge server is over there with always-poor-quality wifi signal.
item.content:encoded: Done with new ISP, new firmware for Linksys E1000 (DD-WRT), and new network arrangement (repeater mode), however the quality didn’t change too much … I need to locate a better place for the repeater, should close to garage as the bridge server is over there with always-poor-quality wifi signal.
